comprehensive_overview: Allpaths-LG is a whole-genome shotgun assembly algorithm developed for large genomes, especially for those of diploid organisms. It aims to leverage the increased coverage provided by short reads to achieve high-quality assemblies.
core_features:
- Able to handle large genomes efficiently
- Specifically designed for diploid organisms
- Utilizes short reads for increased coverage
- Capable of generating high-quality assemblies
